message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $100 is a good offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I understand that $110 is a bit of a stretch for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll sell it to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'll meet you at $108, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm really interested in getting the best deal possible. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $108, but I'm willing to throw in a small bonus to sweeten the deal. I'll sell it to you for $108, and I'll include a free accessory that normally costs $20.
I appreciate the bonus, but I'm still not comfortable paying $108. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $102?
